data.actual_result: emoji breaks and the prince emoji (wrong skin color) along with a strange square appear on the message box
data.expected_result: emoji  automatically pastes into your message box and when you send the message, it works as expected
data.short_description: emoji breaks when trying to add the prince-skin-tone-1 emoji on MacOS via mac emoji  & symbols picker
data.steps_to_repro: - open Discord on a computer running **MacOS**  - start typing a message in the message box - go to edit --> emojis & symbols - select the male prince emoji with white skin and black hair (skin tone 1)
